def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for a,b,c in state:
        check_a_on_edge = get_right([a], ctx) == max(get_right([a,b,c], ctx), get_left([a,b,c], ctx))
        check_b_on_edge = get_right([b], ctx) == max(get_right([a,b,c], ctx), get_left([a,b,c], ctx))
        check_c_on_edge = get_right([c], ctx) == max(get_right([a,b,c], ctx), get_left([a,b,c], ctx))
        check_a_toward_center = are_middle([a], None, ctx) and get_left([a], ctx) < get_left([b,c], ctx)
        check_b_toward_center = are_middle([b], None, ctx) and get_left([b], ctx) < get_left([a,c], ctx)
        check_c_toward_center = are_middle([c], None, ctx) and get_left([c], ctx) < get_left([a,b], ctx)
        check_a_halfway = get_left([a], ctx) > get_left([b,c], ctx) and get_right([a], ctx) < get_right([b,c], ctx)
        check_b_halfway = get_left([b], ctx) > get_left([a,c], ctx) and get_right([b], ctx) < get_right([a,c], ctx)
        check_c_halfway = get_left([c], ctx) > get_left([a,b], ctx) and get_right([c], ctx) < get_right([a,b], ctx)
        if (
            check_a_on_edge or check_b_on_edge or check_c_on_edge
            or check_a_toward_center or check_b_toward_center or check_c_toward_center
            or check_a_halfway or check_b_halfway or check_c_halfway
        ):
            results.append([a,b,c])
    return results
